english_example_sentence: If you expect this important news, your family will also be happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если ты ожидаешь эту важную новость, твоя семья тоже обрадуется.
turkish_example_sentence: Eğer bu önemli haberi beklesen, ailen de sevinir.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Eğer bu önemli haberi ______, ailen de sevinir.
